text: 4. (a) Determine if the following integers are divisible by 2. (2+2+2+1+3=10pts) i) (211102101)3 i) (1112201112)5. (b) Determine which of the following integers are divisible by 3, and which are divisible by 5. i) (3EA235)16 i) (10ABIST301F) 5. (c) Determine if the following integers are divisible by 17. a) (ABCDEF)6 b) (F117921173)16. (d) Suppose that n = 31,888, X74 where X is a missing digit. For what value of X is n divisible by 117 (e) Let n = 59,358,208. Determine which of the integers 7, 11 and 13 divide n.
